title: Infinispan (Red Hat Data Grid) featured in Red Hat Developers
content: Dear Infinispan Community,  The Infinispan team is pleased to share an article published over on the Red Hat Developer blog.  Part one of a two-part series of articles, this blog post focuses on how Data Grid, which is built on Infinispan, was used to create a leaderboard for an online Battleship game that featured at this yearâ€™s Red Hat Summit Keynote.  You can read the blog post  Technologies featured in our keynote demo: * Quarkus and Infinispan Client Extension * Additional Quarkus extensions: RestEasy, Websockets, Scheduler * Infinispan Query * Infinispan Cross-Site Replication * Infinispan Kubernetes Operator  Enjoy your reading!
